ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: every jewel makes a magic item with electrum, and the same for gold and platinum... the cheaper jewels just make rings or whatever that are plus 1 to str,
ygData.messageBody:
every jewel makes a magic item with electrum, and the same for gold and
platinum... the cheaper jewels just make rings or whatever that are plus 1
to str, etc...

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 03:48 PM 5/3/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
>You can start working with electrum now, you just won't be making the
>magical varieties of jewelry. I'm not sure if that's a relevant concern, as
>I don't remember which stones actually create magical jewelry when combined
>with electrum. If the first several cheap stones don't combine to create
>magic jewelry, then there is no sense in waiting... just jump right in!
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
